title: Kevin Volland - AS Monaco

title: Kevin Volland - Wikipedia
snippet: On 1 November 2020, he scored his first two goals in Monaco's win over Girondins de Bordeaux in the Ligue 1. In the first match of the 2021â€“22 season, against Sparta Prague in the preliminary round of the Champions League, he scored his team's second goal with an assist from Sofiane Diop.

title: Timeline of Kevin Volland's Football Career | Timepath Wiki
snippet: Kevin Volland played a crucial role in helping AS Monaco secure a spot in the UEFA Champions League for the 2021-2022 season. His goal scoring and assists throughout the Ligue 1 season were vital as Monaco finished in a high position in the league, enabling them to qualify for Europe's premier ...

title: Kevin Volland joins Union Berlin
snippet: Kevin Volland arrived in the summer of 2020 and played for Monaco for three seasons, making 115 appearances in all competitions (39 goals, 24 assists).

title: AS Monaco: Kevin Volland lands in the principality
